entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 1:30 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
